ICRE.description: "Generates interrupt when ""1"" is set to TCSA.ICLR"

IRQZE.description: "Generates interrupt, when ""1"" is set to TCSA.IRQZF"

ECKE.description: Uses an external input clock (FRCK) as FRT's count clock

AD2E.description: Outputs AD conversion start signal to ADCunit2 upon Zero value detection by FRT

AD1E.description: Outputs AD conversion start signal to ADCunit1 upon Zero value detection by FRT

AD0E.description: Outputs AD conversion start signal to ADCunit0 upon Zero value detection by FRT

FSO0.description: Connects FRT ch.x to OCU ch.0

FSO1.description: Connects FRT ch.x to OCU ch.1

CST0.description: Enables the operation of OCU ch.(0)

CST1.description: Enables the operation of OCU ch.(1)

BDIS0.description: Disables the buffer function of the OCCP(0) register

BDIS1.description: Disables the buffer function of the OCCP(1) register

IOE0.description: "Generates interrupt, when ""1"" is set to OCSA.IOP0"

IOE1.description: "Generates interrupt, when ""1"" is set to OCSA.IOP1"

IOP0.description: Indicates that a match has already been detected between FRT's count value and OCCP(0) value at OCU ch.(0).

IOP1.description: Indicates that a match has already been detected between FRT's count value and OCCP(1) value at OCU ch.(1).

OTD0.description: Indicates that the RT(0) output pin is in the High-level output state.

OTD1.description: Indicates that the RT(1) output pin is in the High-level output state.

CMOD.description: selects OCU's operation mode in combination with OCSC.MOD0 to MOD5

BTS0.description: Performs buffer transfer of the OCCP(0) register upon Peak value detection by FRT

BTS1.description: Performs buffer transfer of the OCCP(1) register upon Peak value detection by FRT

MOD0.description: OCSC.MOD0 and OCSC.MOD1 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.0/ch.1 in combination with OCSB10.CMOD

MOD1.description: OCSC.MOD0 and OCSC.MOD1 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.0/ch.1 in combination with OCSB10.CMOD

MOD2.description: OCSC.MOD2 and OCSC.MOD3 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.2/ch.3 in combination with OCSB32.CMOD

MOD3.description: OCSC.MOD2 and OCSC.MOD3 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.2/ch.3 in combination with OCSB32.CMOD

MOD4.description: OCSC.MOD4 and OCSC.MOD5 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.4/ch.5 in combination with OCSB54.CMOD

MOD5.description: OCSC.MOD4 and OCSC.MOD5 determine the operation mode of OCU ch.4/ch.5 in combination with OCSB54.CMOD

DCK.description: clock cycle of the WFG timer

GTEN.description: the CH_GATE signal for each channel of WFG

PSEL.description: the PPG timer unit to be used at each channel of WFG

PGEN.description: specifies how to reflect the CH_PPG signal that is input to each channel of WFG on WFG output

DMOD.description: specifies which polarity will be used to output the non-overlap signal

NWS.description: noise-canceling width of the noise-canceller for the DTTIX pin

DTIF.description: Indicates that DTIF interrupt has been generated.

DTIC.description: Clears WFIR.DTIF and deasserts the DTIF interrupt signal.

TMIF10.description: Indicates that WFG10 timer interrupt has been generated.

TMIC10.description: Clears WFIR.TMIF10 and deasserts the WFG10 timer interrupt signal.

TMIF32.description: Indicates that WFG32 timer interrupt has been generated.

TMIC32.description: Clears WFIR.TMIF32 and deasserts the WFG32 timer interrupt signal.

TMIF54.description: Indicates that WFG54 timer interrupt has been generated.

TMIC54.description: Clears WFIR.TMIF54 and deasserts the WFG54 timer interrupt signal.

FSI0.description: Connects FRT ch.x to ICU ch.(0)

FSI1.description: Connects FRT ch.x to ICU ch.(1)

EG0.description: enables/disables the operation of ICU-ch.(0) and selects a valid edge(s)

EG1.description: enables/disables the operation of ICU-ch.(1) and selects a valid edge(s)

ICE0.description: "Generates interrupt, when ""1"" is set to ICSA.ICP0."

ICE1.description: "Generates interrupt, when ""1"" is set to ICSA.ICP1."

ICP0.description: Indicates that a valid edge has been detected at ICU ch.(0) and the capture operation has been performed

ICP1.description: Indicates that a valid edge has been detected at ICU ch.(1) and the capture operation has been performed

IEI0.description: indicates the latest valid edge of ICU-ch.(0)

IEI1.description: indicates the latest valid edge of ICU-ch.(1)

CE0.description: enable or disable the operation of ADCMP-ch.0 and select the FRT to be connected

CE1.description: enable or disable the operation of ADCMP-ch.1 and select the FRT to be connected

CE2.description: enable or disable the operation of ADCMP-ch.2 and select the FRT to be connected

SEL0.description: which count state FRT should be in to instruct AD conversion to be started at ADCMP-ch.0

SEL1.description: which count state FRT should be in to instruct AD conversion to be started at ADCMP-ch.1

SEL2.description: which count state FRT should be in to instruct AD conversion to be started at ADCMP-ch.2

BDIS0.description: Disables the buffer function of the ACCP0 and ACCPDN0 registers

BDIS1.description: Disables the buffer function of the ACCP1 and ACCPDN1 registers

BDIS2.description: Disables the buffer function of the ACCP2 and ACCPDN2 registers

BTS0.description: Performs buffer transfer of the ACCP0 and ACCPDN0 registers upon Peak value detection by FRT

BTS1.description: Performs buffer transfer of the ACCP1 and ACCPDN1 registers upon Peak value detection by FRT

BTS2.description: Performs buffer transfer of the ACCP2 and ACCPDN2 registers upon Peak value detection by FRT

AD0P.description: selects the start signal to be used to start priority conversion of ADC unit0

AD1P.description: selects the start signal to be used to start priority conversion of ADC unit1

AD2P.description: selects the start signal to be used to start priority conversion of ADC unit2

TBIE.description: Transmit bus idle interrupt enable bit

SCKE.description: Master mode serial clock output enable bit

FLSTE.description: Re-transmission data lost detect enable bit

FRIIE.description: Received FIFO idle detection enable bit

FLST.description: FIFO re-transmit data lost flag bit

LBR.description: LIN Break Field setting bit (valid in master mode only)

TBIE.description: Transmit bus idle interrupt enable bit

LBD.description: LIN Break field detection flag bit

ESBL.description: Extended stop bit length select bit

LBIE.description: LIN Break field detect interrupt enable bit

LBL.description: LIN Break field length select bits (valid in master mode only)

DEL.description: LIN Break delimiter length select bits (valid in master mode only)

FLSTE.description: Re-transmission data lost detect enable bit

FRIIE.description: Received FIFO idle detection enable bit

FLST.description: FIFO re-transmit data lost flag bit

ACT_SCC.description: Operation flag/iteration start condition generation bit

TBIE.description: Transmit bus idle interrupt enable bit (Effective only when DMA mode is enabled)

TBI.description: Transmit bus idle flag bit (Effective only when DMA mode is enabled)

FLSTE.description: Re-transmission data lost detect enable bit

FRIIE.description: Received FIFO idle detection enable bit

FLST.description: FIFO re-transmit data lost flag bit

MOEXEUP.description: select how to set the MOEX width

MPXCSOF.description: select a CS assertion from the start of accessing to the end of address output

MPXDOFF.description: select whether or not the address is output to the data lines in multiplex mode

ALEINV.description: set up the polarity of the ALE signal

SHRTDOUT.description: select to which idle cycle the write data output is extended

PAGE.description: NOR Flash memory page access mode

WEOFF.description: disable the write enable signal (MWEX) operation

UPOWT.description: USB-PLL oscillation stabilization wait time setting bit

UPLLK.description: Frequency division ratio (K) setting bit of the USB-PLL clock

UPLLN.description: Frequency division ratio (N) setting bit of the USB-PLL clock

UPLLM.description: Frequency division ratio (M) setting bit of the USB-PLL clock

UPCSE.description: USB-PLL oscillation stabilization wait complete interrupt enable bit

UPCSC.description: USB-PLL oscillation stabilization interrupt source clear bit

EI.description: Error Interrupt (unsuccessful transfer completion interrupt enable)

CI.description: Completion Interrupt (successful transfer completion interrupt enable)

EM.description: Enable bit Mask (EB bit clear mask)
